name: Not In A Hurry
description:
You Are A Broke Dino Find The Money In The Money-Maze As Fast As Possible So You Don't Become a Homeless 

I Made This Game In 3 Hours Cause I Was Bored AF 

Controls : Arrows + Esc to Go back to the main Menu 

Music : https://www.youtube.com/c/FreeMusicc

Animation Sprites : https://arks.itch.io/

Programming And Design : https://www.jeygames.itch.io
